document.full_text: the last world war one combat veteran, british-born claude choules, who died aged 110, was laid to rest on friday after a military funeral in the australian port town of fremantle.
document.title: last wwi veteran laid to rest in military funeral
lines_and_colors: the last world war one combat veteran, british-born claude choules, who died aged 110, was laid to rest on friday after a military funeral in the australian port town of fremantle.
